data.title: What is the name of the movie that won the National Award for best Film on social issues, and who directed it?
data.meta_description:
Answer: There are many Indian movies based on social issues which had received National Film Award for Best Film like Padman, Gangaajal, Koi Mil Gaya, Munnudi (Kannada), Naaraayam (Malayalam), Vedham Pudhithu (Bengali), Ore Oru Gramathiley (Tamil), etc.
